import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.037bab5f: 40 Indians travelled from Dubai or UK who are infected

source.2a591a89:
Male percentage of patients those are Deceased are 4% whereas females are 2%. Whereas, 90.9% and 93.82% are Hospitalized, 
also almost same percentile of Males and Females have recovered.
source.4f442ee8: Here, you can see that the virus infected large number of patients who travelled from abroad, also there are 242 reasons why Indians got affected

source.7e0d6385: Almost double in number, males are affected than the number of women affected by the virus
